name: Collective Obligation
flavor_text: "What The Witness gave me, I give to you. May it serve you in death, or in finality. It cannot be both." —Rhulk, disciple of the Witness

frame.name: Void Leech
frame.description: This weapon leeches Void debuffs when damaging targets that are suppressed, weakened, or volatile. Once charged, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to swap firing modes. In this mode, damage from this weapon applies the same Void debuffs that were leeched.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: This weapon's magazine is automatically reloaded when you gain Devour, a Void overshield, or become invisible.
perks.name: Umbral Sustenance

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
